title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 14 § 687.11 - Admission to family care
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 14 § 687.11 - Admission to family care

State Regulations
(a) An
applicant for admission must have a documented diagnosis of developmental
disability as defined in the glossary (section
687.99
). (b) A family care home can meet the needs of
the applicant. CROSS REFERENCES: Responsibility of the department for recipients in family
care, Social Services Law § 138-a. RESEARCH REFERENCES AND PRACTICE AIDS: 88 NY Jur 2d, Public Welfare and Old Age Assistance §
12. (c) The application must
be made in accordance with admission processes established by
OPWDD. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 14
§
687.11

New

York State Register September 21, 2016/Volume XXXVIII, Issue 38, eff. 9/21/2016

Amended

New

York State Register February 15, 2023/Volume XLIV, Issue 07, eff. 2/15/2023

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
